EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Follow up (1326228529.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Follow up (1326228529.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ben,
Anne let me know that you were looking to work with MBO as an Associate now that you have relocated and I wanted to follow up with you to set up a time for us to walk through the program as a refresher and for you to give me an idea of when your next contract would be. I have included a link to my calendar below for you to select a time that is convenient for you:
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
